english.segment1: Waves crashing over. Think I'm going under. Will the Savior keep me above the surface?
english.segment2: Someone in the distance. Please call me from this. Only You can keep me above the surface
english.segment3: Thinking that it all just might fade away. I'm terrified to fall 'cause I stepped out today. Sinking 'cause I know, I know I think too much. Save me, please save me
english.segment4: My eyes are keeping. Focused only on You. It's You that keeps me above the surface. I just can't stop..
english.segment5: Thinking that it all just might fade away. I'm terrified to fall 'cause I stepped out today. Sinking 'cause I know, I know I think too much. Save me, please save me
english.segment6: The stronger the wind blows. The lesser my faith knows. And under the water. I'm colder, I'm farther. I wish I could keep it together. I don't want to let You down
english.segment7: Thinking that it all just might fade away. I'm terrified to fall 'cause I stepped out today. Sinking 'cause I know, I know I think too much. Save me, please save me
